name: Stralia: Revenge of the Emus
description:
“The place is filled with emu’s, and you’ve got to get your revenge on them for raiding your vegemite supplies!”

The endangered world of Stralia welcomes you to slaughter some robotic emu scum in this fun, colourful and PETA-adored first-person shooter experience (probably). Advance through expansive levels, solve platforming puzzles, collect power-ups and decimate wave after wave of emu’s along the way with a selection of cool weaponry in a fight for survival against a dastardly set of Australian avifauna!

Controls:
  • Movement --> WASD
  • Aiming/Camera --> Mouse Movement
  • Fire/Swing --> Left Mouse Button
  • Switch Weapons --> Mouse Wheel or F
  • Jump --> Spacebar
  • Double Jump --> Spacebar (double tapped)
  • Mid-Air Dash --> CTRL (use whilst in the air/after jumping)
  • Pause --> P or Esc
